name: Beasties of Greenhollow
storyline: A strange masked figured invites you into a world of fairies and monsters. There you find plenty of enemies and allies alike as you battle through the strange realms of this forgotten place. You meet resistance on your quest through to create the most powerful team, but still you press on. What purpose did the stranger have sending you here and what is their true secret?
summary: Beasties of Greenhollow is a strategic turn based team building game that features a collection of cute creatures based of Scottish mythology. Explore a mysterious realm of fairies, elves, magic, and creatures while fighting to the center of this hidden realm at the request of a mysterious masked figure. What are Shellycoat’s true intentions?
